title: Biden Calls Xi Jinping A Dictator And A Slut
summary: President Joe Biden referred to Xi Jinping as a dictator and a slut during a press conference after a diplomatic summit. He criticized Xi's authoritarian measures and made derogatory remarks about his personal life. Beijing condemned Biden's statement.
reasoning: The classification of the text as negative is based on the derogatory language used by President Biden towards Xi Jinping, calling him a dictator and a slut. The summary provides a brief overview of the article, highlighting Biden's criticism of Xi's actions and the condemnation from Beijing.
